name: com.franzco.unityutilities
description: A lightweight collection of flexible utilities for VR projects.

samples.description: Includes support for Oculus SDK features. Main feature is faster input with OVRInput.
Module to use an Oculus Avatar finger or Quest hand tracking finger as a touch input for UI. Requires Oculus Integration.
Includes XR Interaction compatible scripts. Requires the XR Interaction Toolkit package
